METAL GEAR SOLID Quiz Free METAL GEAR SOLID Quiz Profile METAL GEAR SOLID Quiz \nregister RESET SETTINGS Reset your settings for ads Tap on the text below to reset your settings for ads and to show the dialog for settings again.\n\nPlease note: this function requires an Internet connection. Date of Birth This app is not subject to any age restrictions. So why this information? Hm… that is a good question! Maybe we should "experiment" with it to see what happens? \nIt would still be nice if you enter at least your correct year of birth. Contact E-Mail:\t dev.hq.smi@gmail.com\nOr use the feedback menu in the main menu to generate an e-mail. Can I delete my profile? Yes, please send an e-mail to dev.hq.smi@gmail.com. Please note you have to send the deletion request from the email address you are registered with in the app! After deleting your profile, your data cannot be restored. E-mail address Is needed to create a profile. This will allow your game data to be loaded if you uninstall the app and reinstall it later. You can also create a new password if you forget your current one. Privacy Policy show privacy policy\n\ntap here App FAQs Other This app uses CountryCodePickerProject library released under the Apache 2.0 license. \n https://github.com/hbb20/CountryCodePickerProject \n https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 \n\nThis app is also featuring Music by Matthew Pablo \nhttp://www.matthewpablo.com Support app development If you like the app, please consider buying a PRO version. For the small price you not only get an ad-free app, but you also support future development and online functionality. \n\nPlease note: There are no additional features in the PRO version!\n\n Show Metal Gear Solid Quiz Pro Username You will be listed in the ranking system under this name. This name is freely selectable and is visible for everyone as soon as you appear in the ranking system. \nPlease note: Profiles with vulgar, offensive and / or right-wing extremist usernames will be deleted. What data is stored and for what purpose? Username, email address, date of birth, country, gender, screen resolution, Android version and game data (e.g. scores in each category). \n\n User name, e-mail address, date of birth, country and gender are user entries and are not read from the device. So you can enter whatever you want. \n\n Country and gender are used for anonymous user statistics. \n\n Screen resolution and Android version is used to optimize the app for different screen sizes and Android versions. Account has been created successfully. Enter your birthday your birthday birthday:\t %1$s Happy birthday, %1$s! Oh, the big day is already tomorrow! :-) The countdown is running. There are just 2 days left! The countdown is running. There are just 3 days left! The countdown is running. There are just 4 days left! This special day is %1$d days away! Happy birthday, \"%1$s\"! o.O ?????? Is that you, MAN? Happy birthday, %1$s!\nThose magic words will be missed. Snnnn.... no, not yet. %1$s So we have to wait a little bit longer. Snaaaaaakeeeeee! Happy birthday, %1$s!\nDon\'t be silent today. :-) Will that day be a quiet day? Don\'t worry about vocal cord parasites. Happy birthday, %1$s!\nThank you for all the good memories. %1$s \nThen somebody also celebrates birthday who has given us a lot of joy. We all looking forward to this date, great master. :-) Happy birthday %1$s and have fun painting! Will we see some cool pictures that day? Hope you like the style. :-) Category: %1$s Normal Hard choose a category comrade Confirm Congratulation
%1$s
You\'ve reached a new high score for a single %2$s category on %3$s difficulty! Congratulation
%1$s
You\'ve reached a max score for a single %2$s category on %3$s difficulty once again!
Is that you, Hideo? Congratulation
%1$s
You\'ve reached %2$d points for a single %3$s category on %4$s difficulty once again!
With a bit more training you can reach new high scores! Is there something wrong
%1$s?
You\'ve already shown that you can do better than this. Let\'s try again. Make Hideo proud and show the whole world your true knowledge! Hm… That was just to warm up.
%1$s
Let\'s try again and show everyone that you can do much better! About FAQs Profile Invite a friend send a request Start New Quiz Statistics World Rankings dev.hq.smi@gmail.com country: Create profile \? Yes Maybe later Difficulty: %1$s hard normal Enter your email address: your email address email:\t %1$s Dear user!\n\nWe use Google Admob to show ads. Ads support our work, and enable further development of this app. In line with the new European Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we need your consent to serve ads tailored for you. Can your data be used to show ads tailored for you? Learn how your data is used No, show ads that are irrelevant Google and its advertising partners: Buy ad-free app version Yes, continue to show relevant ads You can change this setting anytime in the \"About\" section. Thank you! T Available languages for questions - English (available for all questions) \n - German (available for all questions) \n - Russian (available for all questions) \n \nThe language of the questions can be changed in your Profile settings Locked sections After installing the app, some sections are locked. Locked sections are identified by the ???. With increasing score app functions will be unlocked bit by bit. Noticeable are scores at 90, 120 … Points For each correctly answered question you get 1 point. For fast answers there are extra points. For answers within 11 seconds on Normal difficulty level, you get 1.5 points for each correctly answered question. Hard difficulty gives 2 points for each correct answer within 15 seconds. Time penalty If questions are answered quite quickly, but incorrectly, then you get a time penalty of 10 seconds. Game FAQs generate E-Mail Thank you for sending feedback.\nPlease please describe your request as detailed as possible. Message: \n\n\n\n============== Please leave this text as it is! ==============\n\n%1$s your message Please select your e-mail app Subject: Gender: female male m w gender:\t %1$s Log in main menu back to main menu Metal Gear Solid 1 Metal Gear Solid 2 Metal Gear Solid 3 Metal Gear Solid 4 Metal Gear Solid 5 Expert Quiz ok Enter your password (> 6 characters!): Enter your password: your password play again Forgot your password?\nTap here to reset your password. Have you forgot your password?\n\nPlease enter your e-mail address and tap on the button reset password. You received an e-mail to %1$s. Please follow the instructions in the e-mail to reset your password. \n\nAfter pressing ok button you will be redirected to the log in screen. reset password Questions answered: %1$d / %2$d Question %1$s / %2$s English (EN) German (DE) Russian (RU) Questionslanguage: Rate App Rate this app If you enjoy playing MGS Quiz, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? \nThanks for your support! Sure Remind Me Later No, don\'t ask again Don\'t have an account yet? Tap here to register. Score: quiz duration: Your best time: no best time yet Your current score: Your highest score: Your overall score: no score yet Your total score: Correct answers in a row (current Quiz): Correct answers in a row (all time record): %1$s points %1$d min. %2$d sec. Have you already tried the MGS Quiz App from android PlayStore? Would you like to tell your friend about the app? Tell your friend about the app Have you already tried the MGS Quiz App from android PlayStore?\nMy username is %1$s @android:string/cancel What would you like to share? I have reached a new overall score of %1$d points in MGS Quiz App! I have reached a new total score of %1$d points for %2$s Quiz on %3$s difficulty in MGS Quiz App! I have reached a total score of %1$d points for %2$s Quiz on %3$s difficulty in MGS Quiz App! I have reached an overall score of %1$d points in MGS Quiz App! I have answered %1$d question in MGS Quiz App! Select an app show statistics show stats %1$s answers MGS 1 Normal MGS 1 Hard MGS 2 Normal MGS 2 Hard MGS 3 Normal MGS 3 Hard MGS 4 Normal MGS 4 Hard MGS 5 Normal MGS 5 Hard %1$s questions Questions total: Questions answered: Correct answer rate: Expert Quiz - Correct answers in a row on normal difficulty: Expert Quiz - Correct answers in a row on hard difficulty: Expert Quiz - Total score normal difficulty: Expert Quiz - Total score hard difficulty: Overall score: Highest Score Quiz duration Total Score Others Answered Questions Expert Quiz normal Expert Quiz hard Overall score Hard Normal MGS 1 MGS 2 MGS 3 MGS 4 MGS 5 all 00:30 \? \?? \??? unknown comrade update profile Your data has been updated. Enter your username (> 4 characters!): your username Play music Choose a language for questions Welcome %1$s welcome unknown comrade Why should I register? Why should I register?\nYour Registration will enable the app to save your progress online. You will be included in a ranking system and will be able to show all of your expert knowledge of MGS universe to anyone in the world by storming into first place in the respective categories. You will also see the top players of some categories. \nAre you ready to face the challenge and show everyone your class? :-) \n\n Is the registration free?\n YES!\n\nYour e-mail address will not be used to send you any unsolicited e-mails! Please select a date further in the past! Please select a date further in the future! Category and / or difficulty could not be selected Something went wrong. If you keep getting this error, please report it to the developer.\nThank you! Error: please check your input! This email address is already in use. Please use another email address. email address is invalid! There is no such e-mail address in the database. Please check your input. email address begins with an invalid character! Please select your gender! Input required! Please select a subject and / or describe your request! No e-mail app founded on your device! password should contain at least 7 characters! password is too long! There are no questions available. \nIf you think this is an error, please contact the developer. Something went wrong while loading your data. Please try again later. Please select your country! Please select an option first! Connection to server failed. unable to show ads Username already in use. \nPlease choose another username or keep the suggested one! Invalid email or password. Please check your input. Username should contain at least 5 characters!
